proposal: Diving into the world of fried chicken, we noticed KFC's secret blend of 11 herbs and spices isn't the only thing cooking. With 57 holders in the ETH network, it's clear there's a community ready to share more than just a bucket of chicken. Imagine deploying a DEX or a lottery where every dip in sauce could mean a dip into profits for your community. Let's blend our tools with your recipe for success. 🍗🔄
